snippet: While community bankers support the added protection for noninterest-bearing accounts, big banks and other groups said it was time to end the program.
abstract: Bill extending federal program guaranteeing deposits in noninterest-bearing accounts at federally insured banks easily clears procedural hurdle in Senate, setting it up for vote on final passage; community bankers support added protection, but larger banks and other industry groups say it is time to end the program.
lead_paragraph: While community bankers support the added protection for noninterest-bearing accounts, big banks and other groups said it was time to end the program.

headline.seo: Bill to Extend Deposit Insurance Program Moves Forward in Senate
headline.main: Bill to Extend Deposit Insurance Program Moves Forward in the Senate
headline.print_headline: A Bill to Extend a Deposit Insurance Program Moves Forward in the Senate
